# C++ objects and libs
*.slo
*.lo
*.o
*.a
*.la
*.lai
*.so
*.so.*
*.dll
*.dylib

# Ignore general build artifacts
*.qmake.cache
*.qmake.stash
Makefile*

# Ignore user-specific and IDE-specific files
*.pro.user
*.pro.user.*
*.qbs.user
*.qbs.user.*
CMakeLists.txt.user*
*.autosave
compile_commands.json
*creator.user*

# Ignore Qt-specific cache and temporary files
object_script.*.Release
object_script.*.Debug
*_plugin_import.cpp
*.qmlc
*.jsc

# Ignore build directories
*build-*

# Keep generated files that are critical for running
!ui_*.h
!moc_*.cpp
!moc_*.h
!qrc_*.cpp

# Allow prebuilt binaries if necessary
!*.exe
